lead_paragraph: Lincoln Center Out of Doors commemorates the work of Mr. Holder with a screening of “Carmen & Geoffrey” and a performance by that same Carmen de Lavallade, his widow.

headline.main: Dancing for Geoffrey Holder’s Birthday and Legacy
headline.print_headline: Dancing for Geoffrey Holder’s Birthday and Legacy

snippet: Lincoln Center Out of Doors commemorates the work of Mr. Holder with a screening of “Carmen & Geoffrey” and a performance by that same Carmen de Lavallade, his widow.
